name: Overturn Military
description:
Put your finger to direct the flow from one building to another and connect them together.
Your base can collect power and split to increase volume of flows.Capture the enemy bases to grow up and scale your capacity.
Swipe the flow to interrupt it and also you can destroy some obstacles by swiping.
Main target of Overturn Military is to capture neutral(gray) bases and destroy your enemy!
Hints:
In the beginning of every mission you have to try and take over any gray bases close to your base.
It helps strengthen and expand your army than trying to take down an enemy base straight away.
After you’ve turned a gray tower to blue, you can use it to attack others in greater force than you would have originally been able to.
